r=-1,o=t-n||0,i=Array(o<0?0:o);++r<o;)i[r]=e[n+r];return i}n.exports=r},{}],4:[function(e,n,t){n.exports={exists:"undefined"!=typeof window.performance&&window.performance.timing&&"undefined"!=typeof t(t,r,o,i){if(!d.aborted||i){e&&e(t,r,o);for(var a=n(o),u=m(t),f=u.length,c=0;c<f;c++)u[c].apply(a,r);var p=s[y[t]];return p&&p.push([b,t,r,a]),a}}function l(e,n){v[e]=m(e).concat(n)}function m(e){return v[e]||[]}function w(e){return p[e]=p[e]||o(t)}function g(e,n){c(e,function(e,t){n=n||"feature",y[t]=n,n in s||(s[n]=[])})}var v={},y={},b={on:l,emit:t,get:w,listeners:m,context:n,buffer:g,abort:a,aborted:!1};return b}function i(){return new r}function a(){(s.api||s.feature)&&(d.aborted=!0,s=d.backlog={})}var u="nr@context",f=e("gos"),c=e(2),s={},p={},d=n.exports=o();d.backlog=s},{}],gos:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n,t){if(o.call(e,n))return e[n];var r=t();if(Object.defineProperty&&Object.keys)try{return     <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Working at Riot</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20150817/547/working-riot" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky self-posted author- odd clearfix" id="node-article-547">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Working at Riot" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 01-01-15</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20150817/547/working-riot">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20150817/547/working-riot">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/Riot%20Exterior_0.jpg?itok=f9TZaLZL" width="700" height="467" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-1da0-299a-3c4b54b104ca">We work in a collaborative, fast-paced and learning-rich environment with a veteran development team anchored by accomplished leaders in engineering, design, art, publishing and more. We&#39;re always looking for talented and driven people to </span><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers">join us</a> as we strive to create player-focused games.</p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-1da0-299a-3c4b54b104ca">Riot&#39;s a global company &ndash; in addition to the Los Angeles headquarters (located just minutes from the beach), we&#39;ve got outposts in Berlin, Dublin, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Mexico City, Moscow, New York, Paris, Santiago, Sao Paulo, Seoul, San Francisco Bay Area, Shanghai, Singapore, St. Louis, Sydney, Taipei, and Tokyo.&nbsp;</span></p>
<h2>
	RIOT CULTURE</h2>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-9a34-142e-659aed3afa5c">Our goal is to become the most player-focused company in the world. With this mission in mind, we develop high-quality games and services enjoyed by </span><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20140711/1322/league-players-reach-new-heights-2014">tens of millions</a> of players around the world.</p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-9a34-142e-659aed3afa5c">We also take play seriously. For us, it&rsquo;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own. Everyone&rsquo;s first day at Riot begins with a playtest. We try to make it a daily habit. </span><a href="http://i.imgur.com/qMTJwGK.gif">Although we&rsquo;re serious professionals</a>, we don&rsquo;t take ourselves too seriously. Whether it&rsquo;s memes in presentations or the PC Bangs built into the heart of new offices, we make time for play and fun.</p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-9a34-142e-659aed3afa5c">At our core, we&#39;re a group of passionate people who embrace new challenges, thrive in finding smart, out-of-the-box solutions, </span>and love <em>League of Legends</em> and this industry. If this sounds like a team you&#39;d like to be a part of, check out <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers">our job openings</a> across all of our offices.</p>
<h2>
	PERKS OF BEING A RIOTER</h2>
<p>As we focus on creating the best player experiences, we also strive to create a place where Rioters will thrive.&nbsp;Here are a few of the benefits for Rioters in <a href="/articles/20110615/233/riot-games-santa-monica" target="_blank">L</a><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150501/233/riot-games-los-angeles" target="_blank">os Angeles</a>:</p>
<h3>
	THE BASICS</h3>
<ul>
	<li>
		Highly competitive salary</li>
	<li>
		Choice between four subsidized HMO and PPO medical insurance plans</li>
	<li>
		Subsidized vision insurance plan</li>
	<li>
		PPO dental insurance plan</li>
	<li>
		Benefits coverage for domestic partners</li>
	<li>
		Matching 401k</li>
	<li>
		Short term and long term disability insurance</li>
	<li>
		Life insurance (free basic life insurance, plus voluntary life insurance)</li>
</ul>
<h3>
	PERKS BEYOND THE NORM</h3>
<ul>
	<li>
		Open PTO (Paid Time Off)</li>
	<li>
		Flexible hours</li>
	<li>
		Rioter donation matching</li>
	<li>
		On-site, full service cafeteria offering fully subsidized meals and <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/Bilgewater.jpg" target="_blank">coffee bar</a></li>
	<li>
		Office kitchens stocked with free cereal, fresh fruit, snacks, tea, and fresh ground coffee</li>
	<li>
		All-company &quot;Taste the Riot&quot; fairs and <a href="http://thunderdome.riotgames.com/" target="_blank">&quot;Thunderdome&quot; hackathons</a> (infused with adult beverages)</li>
	<li>
		Ongoing education and training through Riot U</li>
	<li>
		<a href="/sites/default/files/uploads/SantaMonica13.jpg">On-site PC Bang</a>&nbsp;and arcade</li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li>
		<a href="/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" target="_blank">Annual Riot Play Fund</a></li>
	<li>
		Optional daily <em>League of Legends </em>playtests</li>
	<li>
		<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/Corner%20exterior.jpg" target="_blank">Top-of-the-line computers and peripherals</a></li>
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eead-57de-e2b0-7c48d94e7c6e">Company events like early movie screenings, </span><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141211/1639/new-friends-face-potluck-game-night">board game nights</a>, and office get-togethers (usually around food).</li>
	<li>
		Submit your champion ideas directly to the people who make &#39;em real</li>
	<li>
		Subsidized gym membership and massage therapy</li>
	<li>
		Riot Games and&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;apparel and promotional items</li>
</ul>
<p><em>It&#39;s Riot Games, Inc., policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of the Riot team. Riot doesn&#39;t unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law. Riot also makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters.</em></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/riot-manifesto-stories" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot Manifesto Stories</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/topic/rioter-perks" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Rioter Perks</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/categories/category" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-tags field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/benefits" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Benefits</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/culture" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Culture</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/focus-talent-team" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Focus on talent &amp; team</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/working-riot" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working at Riot</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/perks" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">perks</a></div></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>
    
		<a href="/news" class="view-all">All Articles</a>
      </div>
</article>
    </div>
  </div>

             glb-grid glb-grid-24 "><div id="glb-topo" class="glb-topo"><style type="text/css">.header-navegacao,.header-navegacao format("svg")}@font-face{font-family:proximanova-light-limited-webfont;src:url(//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/fonts/proximanova-light-limited-webfont.eot);src:url(//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/fonts/proximanova-light-limited-webfont.eot?#iefix) format("svg")}#glb-cabecalho{z-index:99999}#glb-cabecalho>.glb-conteudo{width:100%;min-width:100%}.header-navegacao .grid-12{width:90.625%;margin:0 auto;display:block;position:relative}.header-navegacao .row{width:100%;box-sizing:border-box}.header-navegacao .logo,.header-navegacao .logo-area{display:inline-block;margin:0;padding:0;font-size:0}#busca-padrao,.floating-bar,.glb-on-app.has-regua .header-navegacao,.glbbarrawidget,.header-home .banner,.header-home p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                    small-24
                    medium-24
                    large-24 large-offset-0
                    xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb_topo"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="areatemplate-topo row-full-width"></div><div class="row"><div class="small-24 column areatemplate-showtime"></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row small-collapse medium-uncollapse"><div class="areatemplate-direita-superior
                    column
                    medium-20 medium-offset-2 medium-pull-2 
                    large-9 large-offset-0 large-pull-0
                    xlarge-7 xlarge-offset-1 xlarge-pull-1
                    float-right"></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-15 large-offset-0
                xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1"><script type="text/javascript">SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN={PORTAL:'TechTudo',FEED_TYPE:'SEMANTICO',DEVICE_GROUP:'desktop',IS_PHOTO_PRIORIZED:false,IS_RECOMMENDED:false,FALKOR_URL:'http://falkor-cda.bastian.globo.com',RECOMMENDATION_URL:'http://recomendacao.globo.com/rec/v2/user?client_id=techtudo',HORIZON_HOST:'http://horizon.globo.com',PUSHSTREAM_HOST:'stream.push.globo.com',QUERY_PARAMETER:'<http://semantica.globo.com/techtudo/Categoria_de_Hardware/95>'};BastianVersion='1.10.0-rc10';</script><script>SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN=SETTINGS.BASTIAN||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN["AB_HOST"]="globo-ab.globo.com"</script>

srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/Q7KEUtzrPjuKzC5NGjb36Cua3kE=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2014/08/26/modem-e-muito-pequeno-mas-promete-qualidade.png class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Informática</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 3 anos</span></span></div><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/noticias/noticia/2014/08/menor-modem-wireless-do-mundo-tem-o-tamanho-de-moeda-de-um-centavo.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Menor modem wireless do mundo tem tamanho de moeda de um centavo</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">XMM 6255 promete oferecer alta qualidade de Internet 3G com dimensões bem pequenas em relação aos dispositivos atuais.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Mobile</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 3 anos</span></span></div><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/noticias/noticia/2014/02/mwc2014-huawei-mostra-superbaterias-tabletfone-e-pulseira-smart-no-mwc-2014.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Huawei mostra superbaterias, &#039;tabletfone&#039; e pulseira smart no MWC 2014</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Empresa apresenta cinco novos gadgets: um smartphone intermediário, dois tablets, um hotspot e uma pulseira inteligente; MediaPad X1 e TalkPad são os destaques.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/dicas-e-tutoriais/noticia/2014/01/modem-com-roteador-ou-aparelhos-separados-o-que-funciona-melhor.html" class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Informática</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 3 anos</span></span></div><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/dicas-e-tutoriais/noticia/2014/01/modem-com-roteador-ou-aparelhos-separados-o-que-funciona-melhor.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Modem com roteador ou aparelhos separados? O que funciona melhor?</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">O uso dos modems com roteadores tem se tornado cada vez mais comum, mas será melhor mesmo usar um único equipamento com as duas funções ou o uso dos aparelhos separados oferece uma melhor navegação?</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a mais desespero por não conseguir lembrar a senha da sua Wi-Fi quando alguém vier visitar  nesse tutorial, o TechTudo te ensina como recuperar a palavra-chave da sua rede em apenas quatro passos</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div
